column4: I'll just try it again : there are some applications I apparently cannot start (conqoper and mordor are just two examples). As a user I lack the authorisations, and when I use sudo APPNAME bash doesn't find the apliation, even if I'm in the directory. Any help?
kdesu or gksu for graphical programs.  That's likely your problem.  Delete the Xauthority and ICEauthority files in your homedir
console applications. Both are servers. I'll try deleting Xauthority and ICEauthority
oh, they're servers?  Nevermind then.  That's not your issue.
my gfx card gave up on me, so I have an old one in there. therefore it's nethack or console stuff at the moment if I want to play :)
can I leave your world asap please? I was sooo happy when I got OGRE3D to compile yesterday, and now I can't even write anything for it ;)
well, for most servers, you'll want to run with sudo.  Although, I imagine they have an init daemon. Yeah.
and, I suppose you mustve misspelt the first one.  Since, I don't see it in the repos.
I assumed you meant konqueror, which is why I mentioned the --authority stuff.
the other one is conquest. the manual says to start "conqoper" to setup a game.
I'd try "conquest", "conqinit", or maybe "conquestsh", juding by the files in the package.  Try "man conquest" though, that might give you hte command
sigh ... you beat me to it
